article.title: Northrop Grumman Modifies U.S. Air Force Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Northrop Grumman Integrated Systems, Air Combat Systems, is modifying a contract with the U.S. Air Force for $7.1 million. The effort is for the operation of the Global Hawk System in forward theaters of operation. Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
